attributes.action: Introduce airport taxes at Private Airports for domestic and international flights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The burden of taxation on airport passengers has been increased to help the environment, yet those who can afford to fly in our own jet, or hire a jet pay no such taxes. 

Is this fair!!!!

Is this a case of the rich get richer and the poor get poorer.
